name: qweather-icons
description: Official open source SVG icon and font library for dev.qweather.com
author: dev.qweather.com

scripts.icons: npm run icons-main && npm run icons-font
scripts.icons-zip: cross-env-shell "rm -rf qweather-icons-$npm_package_version && cp -r icons/ qweather-icons-$npm_package_version && cp -r font/ qweather-icons-$npm_package_version && zip -r9 qweather-icons-$npm_package_version.zip qweather-icons-$npm_package_version && rm -rf qweather-icons-$npm_package_version"
scripts.test:lockfile-lint: lockfile-lint --allowed-hosts npm --allowed-schemes https: --empty-hostname false --type npm --path package-lock.json
